title: 23 RP from Riot please!
body:
Hi Riot
I was looking at my Snow Down shop and I have a sale for Mad Hatter Shaco which discounts it by 70% but I only have 133 RP and I need 23 more to get the skin. Please Riot I really want the skin!

replies.body: What category do I put the ticket down as, account or Billing and Store? And for each one which subheading do I put?

> [{quoted}](name=jomoko2012,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UwIOL3xs,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-17T21:45:50.027+0000)
>
> What category do I put the ticket down as, account or Billing and Store? And for each one which subheading do I put?

Just send a support ticket under general question and then feedback.You also need to include a drawing xP

Don't get your hopes up. I expect and hope they won't give you it. If they do give out RP, it should be to every player.
If you REALLY want the skin, it's extremely cheap to buy.

Riot have been known to give out small amounts of RP from 30 or less here's what you gotta do though(if they still do it.):
Send a Support ticket containing the following:

- The amount of RP you NEED.
- A poem or an artistic drawing.

and I wish you best of luck.
What category do I put the ticket down as, account or Billing and Store? And for each one which subheading do I put?
up to you I wouldn't really know myself I have never asked for any RP.
